body:
Veeam Software helps organizations safeguard their investment in VMware virtual infrastructure by providing innovative systems management software designed to reduce costs, increase productivity and mitigate risk. Veeam is rapidly expanding its presence around the world. The company's EMEA headquarters is in Baar, Switzerland with regional offices located throughout EMEA, USA and APAC.

Veeam Software is all about the people. The best people drive the best technologies to help IT organizations all over the world. Do you have a passion for new, cutting-edge technologies? We are always looking for talented, creative and motivated people to join our team. Take a look at the available positions below and apply today.

Responsibilities

Lead role for all marketing activities and results in SEE
Develop and drive marketing strategy and tactics in SEE
Marketing planning and budgeting
PR activities
Ensure effective planning and running of the joint activities with partners, providing partners with any required information or marketing tools
Coordinating and managing trade shows and events
Collecting reports, tracking results
Manage the remote team of marketing specialists

Qualifications

Higher Education
At least  5 years’ experience of work in similar area market 
Fluent English
Good understanding of the marketing mix
Strong proven team management experience in a similar fast-paced, highly-driven workplace
Be a natural Marketing leader
Proven analytical skills at management level
Project management skills
Team Player – must focus on winning as a team rather than individually
Full Driving License and the ability to travel
Active and reliable, self-starter

We offer

Modern, energetic working environment.
Opportunities for professional growth and promotion
Salary ranges depending on skills and expertise
title: MARKETING MANAGER SOUTHERN EASTERN EUROPE
locations: Afi park 1, București, Municipiul București, România
